results.title: Pravastatin prevents miscarriages in antiphospholipid antibody-treated mice.
results.text_hl: In addition, we demonstrated that the statins @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ downregulate @GENE_F3 @GENE_14066 @@@TF@@@ and @GENE_F2RL1 @GENE_14063 @@@PAR-2@@@ expression in neutrophils and thus prevent @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@pregnancy loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Girardi G. Pravastatin prevents miscarriages in antiphospholipid antibody-treated mice. J Reprod Immunol. 2009 Nov;82(2):126-31. PMID: 19556010
citations.BibTeX: @article{19556010, title={Pravastatin prevents miscarriages in antiphospholipid antibody-treated mice.}, author={Girardi G}, journal={J Reprod Immunol}, volume={82}, number={2}, pages={126-31}}

results.title: Neutrophil activation by the tissue factor/Factor VIIa/PAR2 axis mediates fetal death in a mouse model of antiphospholipid syndrome.
results.text_hl: We also demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ decreased @GENE_F3 @GENE_2152 @@@TF@@@ and @GENE_F2RL1 @GENE_2150 @@@PAR2@@@ expression on neutrophils and prevented @<m>DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@pregnancy loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Redecha P, Franzke CW, Ruf W, Mackman N, Girardi G. Neutrophil activation by the tissue factor/Factor VIIa/PAR2 axis mediates fetal death in a mouse model of antiphospholipid syndrome. J Clin Invest. 2008 Oct;118(10):3453-61. PMID: 18802482
